name: offroadJS
description:
[WASD] or [ArrowKeys] to drive [R] to respawn. ([M] brings up an editor panel..., check the menu for more instrucions)

This is not a finished project, but I'd like to have some thoughts/feedback on it. (Does it worth putting more time in it?)

There is room for improvement, I also could write a server to allow browsing, uploading & rating custom maps.

It's open source, you can check the repo on GitHub.
